p: Treatment of nocardiosis is individualized ( 28). Sulfonamides were initially used as nocardiosis treatment ( 29). The most common treatment for Nocardia nowadays is trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole (TMP-SMX) ( 5, 29). Linezolid and carbapenem are also used in nocardiosis ( 7, 30). In this case, previously carbapenem use did not control the infection, whereas treatment of TMP-SMX and linezolid provided symptomatic improvement.
